dict.acceptation: 证明，证实；[法]验证，检定；显示；

sent.orig: Are there any things that we can prove exist (or prove don't exist)?What are they?
sent.trans: 什么东西——我们可以证明存在——什么东西——不能证明。

sent.orig: No amount of experimentation can ever prove me right; a single experiment can prove me wrong.
sent.trans: 我的正确可能经不起不断的试验，而一次简单的试验就可能证明我是错的。

sent.orig: Pathos, humour and terror, in this film, prove rather incompatible bedfellows.
sent.trans: 在这部影片中，哀婉、幽默、恐惧显得是一些互不相容的拼凑。

sent.orig: Events should prove one or other of these explanations to be correct.
sent.trans: 事实会证明，上述解释中总有一个是正确的。

sent.orig: This shift inland could prove vital to China's economic prospects over the next few years.
sent.trans: 现代工业向内陆转移，对于中国未来几年的经济前景可能至关重要。
